price: Afei yεbɛbisa wͻn sε: ”Deε mode bataa (Nyankopͻn) ho no wͻ hen-
arabic: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: thumma qīla lahum ayna mā kuntum tush'rikūna
